summary: Feature request to add SetBinaryChecksum method to the PHP worker, allowing developers to register the binary checksum (e.g., git commit hash) with the worker for deployment rollback strategies.
userImpact: Developers cannot easily register binary checksums with workers, limiting their ability to implement deployment rollback strategies based on code versions.
proposedFix: Add a SetBinaryChecksum method to the worker configuration API that allows setting the binary checksum during worker initialization.
workaround: Use Workflow Versioning as an alternative approach to handle versioning and rollback scenarios.
resolutionDetails: Issue was closed as the recommended solution is to use Workflow Versioning, which is the preferred approach for handling versioning and rollback scenarios in Temporal.
keyQuote: I would like this checksum to be associated with the worker. So whenever a worker is deployed, I would like to set its checksum to with the current git ref/commit.
